svg.style: font-family:Lato, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, 'Liberation Sans', sans-serif;font-feature-settings:"liga", "kern", "calt", "lnum";text-rendering:geometricPrecision;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;font-size:18px;background-color:#ffffff

a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of boys enrolled in pre-primary school

Comparing
net
and
gross enrolment ratios
for boys in
pre-primary
education. Net enrolment shows the share of
boys of pre-primary school age (between 3 and 5 years old) who are enrolled, while gross enrolment includes
all boys regardless of age, expressed as a percentage of boys of the same age group.
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2025); UNESCO Institute for Statistics (UIS), via World Bank (2025)
